episodes_names: Episode 1 - You Said I'd Get a Do-Over in a New World!
Episode 2 - Didn't I Say the Four of Us Would Be a Party?!
Episode 3 - Didn't I Say to Make My Graduation Plain and Simple?!
Episode 4 - Didn't I Say This Was the Crimson Vow's First Step?!
Episode 5 - Didn't I Say That We're Doing Everyone's Backstories?!
Episode 6 - Didn't I Say I'm Not Going Into the Forest Anymore?!
Episode 7 - Didn't I Say We Should Take Breaks Sometimes?!
Episode 8 - No One Mentioned That Pauline's Getting Married, Did They?!
Episode 9 - Didn't I Say Wyvern Hunting?!
Episode 10 - Didn't I Say Surprises Should Be Kept Secret?!
Episode 11 - Didn't I Say Arrogance Leads to Trouble?!
Episode 12 - Didn't I Say The Crimson Vow Would Never Be Destroyed?!
